casebody.data:
MISCELLANEOUS DISMISSALS

2010-0129. Am. Internatl. Recovery v. Allstate Ins. Co.

Portage App. No. 2009-P-0008, 2009-Ohio-6508. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal. Upon consideration of appellant’s application for dismissal,

It is ordered by the court that the application for dismissal is granted. Accordingly, this cause is dismissed.

Pfeifer, Acting C.J.
